parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name whose subdomains you want to query.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language of the domain name.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client that you use to query subdomains.
